name: Maniacal Lawyer

powers.text: Solve a small Legal Challenge. If this Friend is Connected, it becomes Stressed or Disconnects. Limit: Once per Year.

flavor: '... in the real estate game, folks call me "Boots"...'

powers.text: All your roles Need 1 less Knowledge.
This Friend's Passion can also be used as Knowledge, and vice versa.

name: Ex-pat Tavern Keeper

powers.flavor: Take some info, leave some info
powers.text: All your friends Knowledge can be allocated to any Need or Power.

flavor: 'One trick to blend in is driving like a local: 90mph on cracked roads in a beat up 1997 Camry...'

name: Experienced Grifter

powers.text: Unless stressed, this friend's Guile can be used as any other resource except Knowledge.

flavor: 'Normally the price is much higher, but because you're such a good friend...'
